entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Canada Bay area. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Canada Bay area early in the evening. Low minus 13 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
